headline: IPL Auction 2018, Day 2 Highlights: As it happened
content: Rajasthan Royals buy Dushmantha Chameera for 50 lakh, his base price Ashoke Dinda goes unsold Kings XI Punjab buy Chris Gayle for 2 crore, his base priceChirag Gandhi, Akash Bhandari

headline: Australian Open: Federer beats Cilic to win record-extending 20th Grand Slam title
content: It is Federer's sixth title at the Australian Open Federer joined Djokovic and Emerson as joint top for the most Australian Open men's titles

headline: Those guilty of corruption now
content: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday took a veiled dig at former Bihar chief minister Lalu Prasad Yadav and other opposition leaders when he remarked that the war on corruption has ensured that are no longer above the law.

headline: Time has not come for any rethink on AFSPA: Army Chief Gen Bipin Rawat
content: NEW DELHI: Time has not come for any rethink on AFSPA or making some of its provisions milder, Army Chief Gen. Bipin Rawat has said, asserting that the Army has been taking adequate precautions in protecting human rights while operating in disturbed areas like Jammu and Kashmir.

headline: Plea to ban loudspeakers: Delhi HC seeks to know govt
content: NEW DELHI: The Delhi High Court on Monday sought to know from the AAP government and the police measures they have taken on a plea seeking a ban on loudspeakers atop religious structures in the national capital.
